events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will start reviewing your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, specifically for the software development role you applied for.
A recruiter from our engineering talent acquisition team has been assigned to guide you through the next recruitment steps.
We conducted the initial screening of your resume and background, and we are excited to move forward with a technical interview.
Thank you for promptly responding to our scheduling request; you have confirmed availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 3PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and reach out if you have questions.
The technical interview was successfully completed with positive feedback regarding your coding skills and problem-solving approach.
We have scheduled an HR interview on May 25th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals in more detail.
Your HR interview concluded successfully with a focus on aligning your aspirations with our company values and work environment.
We are pleased to propose you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, including competitive salary and benefits.
You have expressed enthusiasm about the offer and requested some clarifications regarding remote work policies and start date.
Congratulations! You have accepted the job offer, and we are excited to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Welcome aboard! Our team is here to support you with all necessary equipment and training.
The hiring process is now complete. Your profile is fully integrated into the company system and your first day is confirmed.
